description:
As the YouTube Strategic Security Partner, you will be responsible for the delivery of GSRS to YouTube, both via direct project management and coordination of existing GSRS support. You will build and leverage relationships across YouTube and GSRS, ensuring clear lines of communication and a comprehensive approach to security and resilience. You will be a focal point for general security consultation with YouTube business units, providing tailored advice and support. You'll be the primary project manager for key initiatives designed by the YouTube Security team, driving key projects to completion. In this role, you'll report to the YouTube Strategic Security Manager under the YouTube Director of Security.

From keeping Googlers safe and secure to managing disruptive events, the ability to anticipate, deter, detect, and act are the pillars of Google’s Global Security and Resilience Services (GSRS) team. As a member of GSRS you will help develop a culture where safety, security and resiliency are integrated into every facet of Google, including the creative process. You will help us continually identify, evaluate and monitor enterprise risks that could affect business activities and provide business leaders the information they need to make critical decisions. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to create innovative strategies and develop best in class programs that drive sustainable effectiveness.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in a relevant field or equivalent practical experience.
  • 7 years of experience in security and risk management in a global tech company.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience with domestic and international law enforcement agencies, including a thorough understanding of processes, workflows and priorities.
  • In-depth knowledge of threat assessment processes and techniques relevant to online threat actors.
  • Demonstrated understanding of YouTube business operations, policies and strategy, as well as security risks associated with user-generated content.
  • Ability to articulate security risk, documenting both short-term plans and long-term strategy.
  • Ability to write clearly and briefly in technical and non-technical formats.
responsibilities:
• Provide consultation, guidance and subject matter expertise on security risk management to YouTube leaders and employees.
  • Support the YouTube Strategic Security Manager and Director of Security with project management and tactical delivery of key initiatives.
  • Participate in complex and/or sensitive security and risk mitigation projects, establishing and overseeing cross-functional tasks as required.
  • Identify gaps and vulnerabilities in YouTube’s security and risk position, designing and implementing solutions with relevant GSRS partners.
  • Act as a subject matter expert and POC for security and safety issues at YouTube, and liaise with international and domestic law enforcement in partnership with the Google Legal team.
title: YouTube Strategic Security Partner, Global Security and Resilience Services
